title: The Bremen town musicians
brief_description: A puppet animation story of a cat, a dog, a rooster and a donkey. When they are told they are too old to work, they decide to run away to become musicians. At night they come upon a robbers hideout where they scare the robbers away and decide to live in the cottage. The robbers return, but the animals scare them away and live happily ever after. This film is recommended to children between the ages of 7-11.
